title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       There is no lodging available within the park boundaries. The nearest hotels and motels within an hour's driving distance of the park include: The Scenic River Inn, 915 Main Street, Wartburg, 423-346-5733 Comfort Inn, 433 S. Rutgers Ave., Oak Ridge, 865-481-8200 Days Inn, 206 S. Illinois Ave., Oak Ridge, 865-483-5615 Hampton Inn, 208 S. Illinois Ave., Oak Ridge, 865-482-7889 Jameson Inn, 216 Rutgers Ave., Oak Ridge, 865-483-6809 Super 8 Motel, 1590 Oak Ridge Tpke., Oak Ridge, 865-483-1200 Staybridge Suites, 420 S. Illinois Avenue, Oak Ridge, 865-298-0050 Holiday Inn Express. 114 Tulsa Road, Oak Ridge, 865-298-1990
